author: Special Correspondent
text:
Employees of Power Grid Corporation of India Limited’s substation at Abhishekapatti near here cleaned the premises of nearby Thulukkarkulam panchayat union primary school recently under the Union Government’s Swacch Bharat Mission.

Joining hands with villagers, school teachers and students, the employees cleaned the premises and donated hand wash dispensers, washbasin and urinals to the school.

Two waste bins in green red and colours were also distributed to the school for putting degradable and non-degradable waste respectively. They educated the students and villagers on the importance of separation of waste at source and proper garbage disposal techniques. They also planted 30 saplings on the premises. An awareness rally with the participation of students and the employees was taken out to create awareness of cleanliness and personal hygiene among villagers. At the end of the rally, the participants pledged to keep the surroundings clean.
title: Clean-up drive at panchayat school
